I'll show you an example - tap the Natur: Ke tla o bontsha mohlala - kobola mokotaba wa Tlhaho
You can choose a start date and end date: O ka kgetha letsatsi la ho qala le letsatsi la ho qetella bakeng sa mokotaba ona.
You can choose a language for this theme: O ka kgetha puo bakeng sa mokotaba ona. Ke tla o bontsha diketsahalo ka puo ena haeba di fumaneha.
Great! I have planned all your activitie: Ke hantle! Ke se ke hlophisitse diketsahalo tsa hao kaofela! Kobola ketsahalo ho bona dintlha.
See the activity details here. You're al: Sheba dintlha tsa ketsahalo mona. O se o qetile ho kenya mokotaba!
If you don't want to use a theme, you ca: Haeba o sa batle ho sebedisa mokotaba, o ka kobola mona ho kgetha ketsahalo!
Great! Now the activity is selected. Whe: Ke hantle! Jwale ketsahalo e kgethilwe. Ha o batla ho ithuta haholwanyane ka ketsahalo, o ka kobola ho aekhoho ena.
Great, you're ready to start!: Ke hantle, o se o loketse ho qala!
